1000000101100101 0011101001110110 1 -> sum: 1011101111011100, cout: 0
1001000111111100 0000100010001100 0 -> sum: 1001101010001000, cout: 0
1000000100111101 1111010100100101 1 -> sum: 0111011001100011, cout: 1
